Articles.Content:
I was tired of my rovers running out of fuel. So I made a bigger one.

> ![bigrover.png](http://img822.imageshack.us/img822/3824/bigrover.png)

It got a bit out of hand. 22 tanks will get you pretty much anywhere you want to go on Minmus, though, and a fair way along the Mun. 

Incidentally, the entire launch vehicle looks like this:

> ![bigroverlauncher.png](http://img42.imageshack.us/img42/2338/bigroverlauncher.png)

It\'s pretty stable to get down to your low-gravity body of choice, and it\'s designed to land tail-down, then launch and flip forwards. Once you do, it\'s fairly straightforward to maneuver as long as you use ASAS liberally and don\'t go too fast without being ready to land softly. 43 tons of lander hitting the ground at 20 m/s is not a good idea for these wheels.

Anyway, have fun with it!
Not to be confused with the space going Ferarri mod made by CardboardBoxProccessor?

> 
> Not to be confused with the space going Ferarri mod made by CardboardBoxProccessor?

Not since the title change, I hope. Thanks for the heads up.
